class_notes: (Same as CHN 319 1, EAS 319 1) This class contains synchronous and asynchronous material. It will meet synchronously at the listed day and time, with all other content to be completed asynchronously.
course_description: The course is an introduction to traditional Chinese drama, from the13th to the 20th century. We will focus on drama as literature but we will also explore the social, material, and performative dimensions of theater, including modern-day stage adaptations of traditional plays.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 4710, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 11:20a-12:35p, Instructor: M. Sibau, Status: Closed
